E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 5/19/1988
Subject: Wondering
Boss,
What about my playing time? Am I not
good enough to play regularly for this
team? I'm not a happy camper right now. If that doesn't
change, trade me!

Regards,
Buddy Bell



Date: Monday, 5/19/1988
Subject: Status of Ron Tingley
Dear Sir,
Ron Tingley shouldn't play at AA Greenville Braves!
He has an AVG of .244 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/22/1988
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Mike Krukow
